TABLE.NAME: gradingform_frubric_criteria
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the columns of the frubric grid

FIELD.NAME: definitionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the form definition this criterion is part of

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the order of the criterion in the rubric

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field

FIELD.NAME: criteriajson
FIELD.COMMENT: Keep a reference to the criteria and its levels in JSON format

TABLE.NAME: gradingform_frubric_levels
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the rows of the frubric grid

FIELD.NAME: criterionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The rubric criterion we are level of

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: The score range for this level

FIELD.NAME: definition
FIELD.COMMENT: The optional text describing the level

FIELD.NAME: definitionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the definition field

TABLE.NAME: gradingform_frubric_fillings
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the data of how the frubric is filled by a particular rater

FIELD.NAME: instanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the grading form instance

FIELD.NAME: criterionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the criterion (row) in the rubric

FIELD.NAME: levelid
FIELD.COMMENT: If a particular level was selected during the assessment, its ID is stored here

FIELD.NAME: remark
FIELD.COMMENT: Side note feedback regarding this particular criterion

FIELD.NAME: remarkformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the remark field

INDEX.NAME: ix_levelid
INDEX.COMMENT: levelid acts as a foreign key but null values are allowed
